body:
Comment 14: 
The build seems broken right now, due to this change:

[..pkg/runtime/cgo]% make
6g -o _go_.6 cgo.go 
6c -FVw iscgo.c
echo >_cgo_defun.c
gcc -m64 -g -fPIC -O2 -o _cgo_main.o -c  _cgo_main.c
gcc: _cgo_main.c: No such file or directory
gcc: no input files
make: *** [_cgo_main.o] Error 1
